name: Interracial Hatred
text: Cards with the [[kree]] and [[skrull]] trait you control cannot ready. Alter-Ego Action: Exhaust Teddy Altman → discard this obligation.

name: Empress R'Klll
text: Villainous. [star] Empress R'Klll's attacks gain piercing. When Revealed: Empress R'Klll attacks each player in hero form. (Hulkling's nemesis minion.) "Your empire will shatter, and the last light will dim."

name: DNA Masking
text: "I spent years infiltrating the Kree! Masking my DNA, risking death at every turn! All for you… the last of the line! My grandson!" —R'Klll Minions cannot take damage. Threat cannot be removed from DNA Masking while there are no minions in play.

name: Inhibited
text: Attach to your identity. You cannot change form or play cards that share a [[trait]] with your identity. Action: Spend [physical][physical] resources → discard this card. "I'm guessing this inhibitor mask they put me in is blocking my Skrull half." —Hulkling

name: Assailed by Their Own
text: When Revealed (Alter-Ego): Exhaust your identity. When Revealed (Hero): Choose a character in play (other than your identity) that shares a [[trait]] with your hero. Take X damage where X is equal to the chosen character's ATK. Otherwise, exhaust your identity.

name: Swapping Roles
text: When Revealed: Exhaust each card you control that shares a [[trait]] with your identity (including your identity). [star] Boost: Exhaust each card you control that shares a [[trait]] with your identity (except for your identity).

name: Untrustworthiness
text: Forced Interrupt: When a "Boost" or "When Revealed" ability on a [[treachery]] card would be resolved, cancel that ability. Then, deal yourself 1 facedown encounter card. Alter-Ego Action: Exhaust Laura Green → discard Untrustworthiness.

name: Paibok
text: Toughness. [star] Paibok gets +1 SCH and +1 ATK for each [[treachery]] card attached to him. Forced Interrupt: When a [[treachery]] card would be discarded, attach it facedown to Paibok instead. (Lyja's nemesis minion.) "Total humilation is truly the best revenge!"

name: Punish the Defector
text: In a battle between the Fantastic Four and her former lover Paibok, Lyja still bore feelings for the Torch and again betrayed Paibok to side with the Fantastic Four. When Revealed: Search the encounter deck for a [[treachery]] card and discard it. Shuffle the encounter deck. [hazard]

name: "It's a Stinkin' Skrull!"
text: When Revealed: Search the encounter deck for a [[treachery]] card and discard it. (Shuffle.) If no [[treachery]] card was discarded this way, this card gains surge. "I got real bad news fer ya kid… Yer lovin' wife is a stinkin' Skrull!!" —Thing

name: Truth Revealed
text: When Revealed: Search your deck for all identity-specific cards, shuffle your deck and place those cards on the bottom of your deck in any order. "What have you done to my wife?! How long have you been masquerading as her?!" —Human Torch

flavor: "Before you stands Dorrek, emperor to a world whose name no outworlder could ever pronounce, and to a race named Skrull! We are, to put it simply, a proud people! Some might even call us imperious!"
name: Emperor Dorrek I
text:
Retaliate 1.
[star] Emperor Dorrek I's attacks gain ranged.
X : the villain don't have hit points. Damage are dealt do the Skrull Empire Environment.

flavor: "Before you stands Dorrek, emperor to a world whose name no outworlder could ever pronounce, and to a race named Skrull! We are, to put it simply, a proud people! Some might even call us imperious!"
name: Emperor Dorrek I
text:
Retaliate 1.
[star] Emperor Dorrek I's attacks gain ranged.
X : the villain don't have hit points. Damage are dealt do the Skrull Empire Environment.

flavor: "Before you stands Dorrek, emperor to a world whose name no outworlder could ever pronounce, and to a race named Skrull! We are, to put it simply, a proud people! Some might even call us imperious!"
name: Emperor Dorrek I
text:
Retaliate 2.
[star] Emperor Dorrek I's attacks gain ranged.
X : the villain don't have hit points. Damage are dealt do the Skrull Empire Environment.

flavor: "Every single member of your species will die under my rule. And your families will be the first blood I taste."
name: Emperor Dorrek VII
text:
Incite 1[per_hero].
[star] Emperor Dorrek VII's attacks gain overkill.
X : the villain don't have hit points. Damage are dealt do the Skrull Empire Environment.

flavor: "Every single member of your species will die under my rule. And your families will be the first blood I taste."
name: Emperor Dorrek VII
text:
Incite 1[per_hero].
[star] Emperor Dorrek VII's attacks gain overkill.
X : the villain don't have hit points. Damage are dealt do the Skrull Empire Environment.

flavor: "Every single member of your species will die under my rule. And your families will be the first blood I taste."
name: Emperor Dorrek VII
text:
Incite 1[per_hero].
[star] Emperor Dorrek VII's attacks gain overkill.
X : the villain don't have hit points. Damage are dealt do the Skrull Empire Environment.

flavor: "I am far more than a mere Skrull! I am R'Klll, empress of Skrulls! Survivor of Galactus! Mother of Anelle, the holy martyr! Grandmother to Dorrek VIII, the king of all space!"
name: Empress R'Klll
text: When Revealed: Empress R'Klll attacks each player in hero form. [star] Empress R'Klll's attacks gain piercing. X : the villain don't have hit points. Damage are dealt do the Skrull Empire Environment.

flavor: "I am far more than a mere Skrull! I am R'Klll, empress of Skrulls! Survivor of Galactus! Mother of Anelle, the holy martyr! Grandmother to Dorrek VIII, the king of all space!"
name: Empress R'Klll
text: When Revealed: Empress R'Klll attacks each player in hero form. [star] Empress R'Klll's attacks gain piercing. X : the villain don't have hit points. Damage are dealt do the Skrull Empire Environment.

flavor: "I am far more than a mere Skrull! I am R'Klll, empress of Skrulls! Survivor of Galactus! Mother of Anelle, the holy martyr! Grandmother to Dorrek VIII, the king of all space!"
name: Empress R'Klll
text: When Revealed: Empress R'Klll attacks each player in hero form. [star] Empress R'Klll's attacks gain piercing. X : the villain don't have hit points. Damage are dealt do the Skrull Empire Environment.

flavor: "Everything is subordinate to the triumph of the Skrulls!"
name: Empress S'Byll
text:
Steady. Toughness.
X : the villain don't have hit points. Damage are dealt do the Skrull Empire Environment.

flavor: "Everything is subordinate to the triumph of the Skrulls!"
name: Empress S'Byll
text:
Steady. Toughness.
X : the villain don't have hit points. Damage are dealt do the Skrull Empire Environment.

flavor: "Everything is subordinate to the triumph of the Skrulls!"
name: Empress S'Byll
text:
Stalwart. Toughness.
X : the villain don't have hit points. Damage are dealt do the Skrull Empire Environment.

name: Rise of the Skrull Empire
text: Contents: All villains (I) and (II) (stages (II) and (III) instead for the expert mode). Skrull Empire, Skrull Society and Standard sets. One modular set (Army of Skrulls). Setup: Create the PLANET and the Villain deck (see insert). Reveal the top card of the Villain deck. Put the Skrull Empire environment (I) into play (stage (II) instead for the expert mode).

flavor: The Skrulls are a breed of green-skinned humanoids from the Andromeda Galaxy. They are a fierce warrior race who carved for themselves the oldest surviving empire in the Universe's history.
name: Rise of the Skrull Empire
text: When Revealed: Reveal the top card of the PLANET deck.

flavor: The Andromeda Galaxy is home to a great number of alien species, foremost among them the Skrulls who are usually the dominant force of their galaxy, a galaxy with millions of inhabited worlds.
name: Andromeda Galaxy Colonization
text: When Revealed: Discard cards from the encounter deck until a Skrull minion is discarded. Put that minion into play engaged with the first player.

flavor: The Skrulls have dominated the Andromeda Galaxy for tens of millions of years, though their dominance has fluctuated as their empire has gone through cycles of expansion, decline, and resurgence.
name: Andromeda Galaxy Colonization
text: When Revealed: Reveal the top card of the PLANET deck.

flavor: The Skrulls have also expanded their dominion by colonizing uninhabited worlds. Within the Andromeda Galaxy, the Skrull have conquered or colonized every suitable world.
name: Further Empire Expansion
text: When Revealed: Discard cards from the encounter deck until a Skrull minion is discarded. Put that minion into play engaged with the first player.

flavor: As time went on, Skrulls were already expanding into neighboring galaxies becoming an intergalactic empire.
name: Further Empire Expansion
text: When Revealed: Reveal the top card of the PLANET deck.

flavor: The Skrulls consider it their duty to bring peace to the cosmos by conquering and subjugating every inhabited world in the universe.
name: Entire Universe Domination
text: When Revealed: Discard cards from the encounter deck until a SKRULL minion is discarded. Put that minion into play engaged with the first player.

flavor: Skrulls are taught that every world in the cosmos is meant to be a Skrull world. They see it as their destiny.
name: Entire Universe Domination
text: When Revealed: Reveal the top card of the PLANET deck. If this stage is completed, the players lose the game.

name: Skrull Empire I
text: Incite Rebellion - Hero Action: Choose to either exhaust your hero or spend 2 resources of any type → choose 1 PLANET environment in play. Treat its printed text box as if it were blank until the end of the round. (Limit once per round per player.)

name: Skrull Empire II
text: When Revealed: Shuffle each set-aside Overthrow into the encounter deck. Incite Rebellion - Hero Action: Choose to either exhaust your hero or spend 2 resources of any type → choose 1 PLANET environment in play. Treat its printed text box as if it were blank until the end of the round. (Limit once per round per player.)

name: Skrull Empire III
text: When Revealed: Shuffle each set-aside Overthrow into the encounter deck. Incite Rebellion - Hero Action: Choose to either exhaust your hero or spend 2 resources of any type → choose 1 PLANET environment in play. Treat its printed text box as if it were blank until the end of the round. (Limit once per round per player.)

flavor: A jewel in the crown of the Skrull Empire. Once the remote world was a wildlife sanctuary. A garden on the edge of spacefor the Skrull empress and her most trusted advisors to enjoy.
name: Aks'lo
text: Each SKRULL minion gets +2 hit points.

flavor: Hy'lt Minor was a planet inhabited by the Skrulls. It was attacked by the Builders who sent an army of Alephs to destroy it.
name: Hy'lt Minor
text: Each identity gets -1 REC.

flavor: The third known world to be the Throneworld of the Skrull Empire. A throneworld under Empress S'Byll and later Queen Veranke.
name: Satriani
text: Each SKRULL minion gains guard.

flavor: Skrell, a colony world which was founded by Skrull scientists, was mostly ignored by the warlords, who traditionally had little regard for the scientist cast.
name: Skrell
text: Each SKRULL minion gets +1 SCH.

flavor: At first there were three groups of Skrulls on Skrullos, the immortal Eternals rapidly evolving Prime Skrulls and the shapeshifting Deviants.
name: Skrullos
text: Each side scheme gains the crisis icon ([crisis icon]).

flavor: Tarnax II is a world of chameleons, or better said shape-shifters, not bound to one specific shape or purpose of form. A new Skrull civilization was established on this planet.
name: Tarnax II
text: Decrease the target threat value of the main scheme by 1[per_hero] .

flavor: Approximately 100,000 years ago, the Skrulls throneworld was relocated to Tarnax IV. It remained the center of the empire till its destruction at the hands of Galactus.
name: Tarnax IV
text: While a side scheme is in play, this card gains the amplify icon ([amplify]).

flavor: Tarnax VII is another planet, ruled by the Skrull Empire. It contains several military training centers, specializing in the training of Super-Skrulls.
name: Tarnax VII
text: Each SKRULL minion gets +1 ATK.

flavor: Zaragz'na was a home to the family of Kl'rt, but years before he became the Super-Skrull. He betrothed a wealthy Skrullian countess ans spawned two children, a son, Sarnogg, and a daughter, Jazinda.
name: Zaragz'na
text: Each ally and support enters play exhausted.

name: Impostor
text: Treat attached ally as a SKRULL minion with a blank text box. Attached minion's SCH is equal to its printed THW and it does not take consequential damage. When revealed: Attach to the non-SKRULL ally with the most remaining hit points without Impostor attached. Attached ally engages its controller. Otherwise, the villain schemes.

name: Intelligentsia
text: Each other SKRULL enemy gets +1 SCH. [star] Forced Interrupt: When Intelligentsia would attack, she schemes instead. [acceleration]

flavor: "How dare you come here and threaten me in my own home? The Earth planet is ours!" -Emperor Dorrek VII
name: Emperor's Throne
text: When Defeated: The villain attacks the player who defeated this scheme (even if that player is in alter-ego form). Give the villain 1 additional boost card for this activation. [acceleration] [hazard]

flavor: Emperor Dorrek I was the Skrull ruler who began to expand his race's influence by seeking new worlds beyond their own.
name: Seeking a Suitable World
text:
Incite 2.
[acceleration]

flavor: "The war song of the Skrulls sings inside you. You are the requiem of the shapeless soul!" -Empress S'Byll
name: A New Skrull Is Born
text: When Revealed: Discard cards from the encounter deck until you discard a SKRULL minion and reveal it.

flavor: "Warriors of the Skrull armada! This base now belongs to us!" -Emperor Dorrek VII
name: Giving Orders
text: When Revealed: Each SKRULL minion activates against the player it is engaged with. If no minion activated this way, this card gains surge.

name: Long Live the Empire
text: When Revealed: Heal 2 damage from the villain for each SKRULL enemy in play. If no damage was healed this way, this card gains surge. [star] Boost: Heal 1 damage from the villain for each SKRULL enemy in play.

name: Overthrow
text: When Revealed: Remove the current villain from the game and reveal the top card of the villain deck. Then, set Overthrow aside, out of play. [star] Boost: Deal this card to yourself as a facedown encounter card.

name: Wrath of the Empire
text: When Revealed: Discard the top 2 cards of the encounter deck for each PLANET environment in play. Place 1 acceleration token on the main scheme, if a card with the acceleration icon ([acceleration]) was discarded this way. [star] Boost: This card gets +1 boost icon ( [boost] ) for each PLANET environment in play.

name: Skrull Scientist
text: [acceleration] [star] Boost: Heal 2 damage from the villain, after this activation ends. "He truly loves us. The Empire will live." —Dro'ge

name: Skrull Spy
text: When Revealed: Discard 1 random card from your hand. [star] Boost: Discard 1 random card from your hand.

name: Skrull Telepath
text: [star] Forced Interrupt: When Skrull Telepath would attack, it schemes instead. [star] Boost: If this activation is a scheme, reveal this card.

name: Skrull Warrior
text: Guard. (While this minion is engaged with you, you cannot attack the villain.) [star] Boost: If this attack is undefended, you are stunned. "You should not have forgotten I'm a Skrull." —M'lanz

name: Plotting Revenge
text: The Skrulls thoroughly studied human behavior in order to achieve their goal of conquering Earth and completely dominating the universe. Hinder 2[per_hero]. [acceleration]

name: Outnumbered
text: When Revealed: Engage each [[skrull]] minion in play. Then, search the encounter deck and discard pile for a [[skrull]] minion and reveal it. [star] Boost: This card gets +1 boost icon ([boost]) for each [[skrull]] enemy in play (to a maximum of +4) for this activation. "Warriors of the Skrull armada! This base now belongs to us!" —Emperor Dorrek VII

name: Skrull Commander
text: Each other [[skrull]] minion gets +1 ATK. [star] Boost: If this activation is an attack, this card gets +2 boost icons ([boost][boost]) for this activation. "If he was a significant threat, we would know who he is" —Commander Ak'strk

name: Skrull Soldier
text: When Revealed: Place 2 threat on each side scheme in play. [star] Boost: Discard the top 2 cards of your deck. "He loves you..."

name: Hijacked
text: Hinder 1[per_hero]. When Revealed: Search your deck, discard pile and hand for an ally and place it beneath this scheme. When Defeated: Put the ally beneath this scheme into play under its owner's control. • [star] Boost: Reveal this card.

name: Skrull Assault
text: When Revealed: Each [[skrull]] minion attacks the hero it is engaged with. If no attacks were made this way, this card gains surge. [star] Boost: This card gets +1 boost icon ([boost]) for each [[skrull]] enemy in play (to a maximum of +4) for this activation.

name: Super-Skrull
text: Forced Response: After resolving step two of the villain phase, shuffle each [[superpower]] attachment from play into the [[superpower]] deck and reveal the top card of the [[superpower]] deck. “This is no common miscreant you face. Mine is the combined power of the Fantastic Four!”

name: Super-Skrull
text: Forced Response: After resolving step two of the villain phase, shuffle each [[superpower]] attachment from play into the [[superpower]] deck and reveal the top 2 cards of the [[superpower]] deck. “This is no common miscreant you face. Mine is the combined power of the Fantastic Four!”

name: Super-Skrull
text: Forced Response: After resolving step two of the villain phase, shuffle each [[superpower]] attachment from play into the [[superpower]] deck and reveal the top 2 cards of the [[superpower]] deck. “This is no common miscreant you face. Mine is the combined power of the Fantastic Four!”

name: Searching for the Heir
text: Contents: Super-Skrull I and Super-Skrull II (Super-Skrull II and Super-Skrull III for expert mode). Super-Skrull and Standard encounter sets. Two modular encounter sets (Army of Skrulls and Kree-Skrull War). Setup: Shuffle each [[superpower]] attachment into the [[superpower]] deck and set it next to the encounter deck.

name: Searching for the Heir
text: Learning that Princess Anelle had a child with his old foe, the original Captain Marvel and that the Skrull Empire was seeking out this heir, named Dorrek VIII, the Super-Skrull made it his mission to be the first to find the boy, hidden on planet Earth. When Revealed: Reveal the top card of the [[superpower]] deck.

name: Heir to the Throne
text: The Super-Skrull broadcasted to all Skrull worlds that he had located Dorrek VIII, who turned out to be Hulkling, a member of the recently formed Young Avengers team. When Revealed: If Lord Kl'rt is in play, deal each player a facedown encounter card. Otherwise, search the encounter deck and discard pile for Lord Kl'rt and attach it to Super-Skrull. Shuffle the encounter deck.

name: Heir to the Throne
text: Kl'rt, the Super-Skrull, revealed Hulkling the truth about his past. He insisted that he must return to his people so that they could reunite the Skrull Empire. When Revealed: Reveal the top card of the [[superpower]] deck. If this stage is completed, the players lose the game.

name: Flexibility
text: Attach to Super-Skrull. Super-Skrull gains stalwart and his attacks gain ranged. "You are nothing compared to me. I have more power than all four of you combined." —Super-Skrull

name: Invisibility
text: Attach to Super-Skrull. As an additional cost to attack Super-Skrull, you must spend 1 resource of any type. "Invisibility is one of the powers I wield as the Super-Skrull. A secondary effect of that power allows me to see what is hidden from sight..." —Super-Skrull

name: Pyrokinesis
text: Attach to Super-Skrull. Forced Response: After a friendly character thwarts the main scheme, deal 1 damage to it. [star] Super-Skrull's attacks gain piercing. "Fools, you should have run while you had a moment's chance!" —Super-Skrull

name: Rock Mimicry
text: Attach to Super-Skrull. [star] Forced Interrupt: When Super-Skrull attacks, give him 1 additional boost card for this activation. [star] Super-Skrull's attacks gain overkill. "Before I am done, human, you will beg me for the swift, sure release of death!" —Super-Skrull

name: Invisible Forcefield
text: Attach to the enemy with the highest printed hit points and without another Invisible Forcefield attached. If you cannot, this card gains surge. Forced Interrupt: When any amount of damage would be dealt to attached character, place it here instead. Then, if there is at least 5 damage here, discard this card.

name: Lord Kl'rt
text: Attach to Super-Skrull. [amplify] Hero Action: Reveal the top card of the [[superpower]] deck → discard this card. [star] Boost: Reveal this card. "I was bred and raised to be a warrior. The most powerful warrior of the whole race." —Super-Skrull

name: Mt'nox
text: [star] Forced Response: After Mt'nox makes an undefended attack against you, discard the top card of your deck. If that card's printed resource has: [physical] - Give the villain a tough status card. [energy] - You are stunned. [mental] - You are confused. [wild] - All of the above.

name: Praxagora
text: [star] Praxagora's attacks gain overkill. "All it takes is a thought...the flick of a mental switch...and I become a countdown to Armageddon."

name: R'kin
text: When Defeated: Discard cards from the top of the encounter deck until an attachment is discarded. Reveal that card. "I hope you're ready to be a hero, R'Kin. Because we will either return as heroes or not at all." —Super-Skrull

name: Galactic Council Membership
text: The Galactic Council is an intergalactic organization which was created to deal with important matters in the universe. Represented are the races of eight galaxies and other dimensions. Forced Response: After a player attacks Super-Skrull, place 1 threat on the main scheme. [acceleration]

name: Skrull Warlords
text: The Super-Skrull became one of many Warlords seeking to re-unite the divided Skrull territories. He became one of the six most powerful Warlords who united themselves against this common foe. Forced Response: After a card enters play under any player's control, give the villain a facedown boost card.

name: Hypnotic Gaze
text: When Revealed: Discard the top 2 cards of your deck. For each [physical] resource discarded this way stun a character you control, for each [mental] resource discarded this way confuse a character you control. "Let me show you an ability I haven't used in some time. The matchless power of hypnotism!" —Kl'rt

name: Power Multiplying
text: When Revealed: Reveal the top card of the [[superpower]] deck. If you cannot, this card gains surge. [star] Boost: This card gets +1 boost icon ([boost]) for each [[superpower]] attachment attached to Super-Skrull. "Fools, you should have run while you had a moment's chance!" —Super-Skrull

name: Villain's Versatility
text: When Revealed: If Super-Skrull has the following [[superpower]] attachment attached: • Pyrokinesis - Take 3 indirect damage. • Rock Mimicry - Give Super-Skrull a tough status card. • Flexibility - Discard 1 card from your hand. • Invisibility - Place 2 threat on the main scheme.

name: Bel-Dann
text: When Revealed: Search the encounter deck and discard pile for Raksor and put him into play engaged with you. "Any one of these beings may be my enemy in disguise. I must take no chances… destroy them all!"

name: Raksor
text: When Revealed: Search the encounter deck and discard pile for Bel-Dann and put him into play engaged with you. "Never in all my days did I ever think I would fight alongside a… Kree!"

name: Earth Involvement
text: Both the Kree and Skrulls are involving Earth in their plans in this intergalactic war. Permanent. Setup. While there is at least 1 threat here, this card gains a crisis icon ([crisis]). Forced Response: After a card that belongs to the Kree-Skrull War encounter set is revealed, place 2 threat here. [hazard]

name: Imperial Kree Army
text: When Revealed: Discard the top card of the encounter deck. Deal 1 damage to each character you control for each boost icon ([boost]) discarded this way. [star] Boost: Place 2 threat on Earth Involvement. "Trust. What do humans know of trust? You can't even agree on one god." —Nogor

name: Skrull Imperial Fleet
text: When Revealed: Discard the top card of the encounter deck. Place 1 threat on each scheme in play for each boost icon ([boost]) discarded this way. [star] Boost: Place 2 threat on Earth Involvement. "Trust. What do humans know of trust? You can't even agree on one god." —Nogor

name: Paibok
text: Toughness. While the number of [[power skrull]] cards attached to Paibok is equal to or less than the number of mastery counters on him, [[power skrull]] cards cannot be discarded. “I can easily kill you with my bare hands! I am Paibok, the genetically enhanced Power Skrull!”

name: Paibok
text: Toughness. While the number of [[power skrull]] cards attached to Paibok is equal to or less than the number of mastery counters on him, [[power skrull]] cards cannot be discarded. When Revealed: Search the encounter deck and discard pile for a [[power skrull]] card and reveal it.

name: Paibok
text: Toughness. While the number of [[power skrull]] cards attached to Paibok is equal to or less than the number of mastery counters on him, [[power skrull]] cards cannot be discarded. When Revealed: Search the encounter deck and discard pile for a [[power skrull]] card and reveal it.

name: Power Skrull Engineering
text: Paibok the Power Skrull. All the powers of some of the X-Men. None of the conscience. Contents: Paibok I and Paibok II (Paibok II and Paibok III for expert mode). Paibok and Standard encounter sets. One modular encounter set (New Revengers). Setup: Place 1 mastery counter on Paibok.

name: Power Skrull Engineering
text: Paibok was trained at the Skrullian military academy, and was bionically re-engineered to posses more power than the Fantastic Four. So he became the first Power Skrull. When Revealed: Discard cards from the encounter deck until a [[power skrull]] card is discarded. Reveal that card. Shuffle the encounter discard pile into the encounter deck.

name: Mastering Superpowers
text: Paibok wants to take revenge on the Earth's superheroes and destroy them once and for all. To achieve his goal, he needs to master all his newly acquired superpowers. When Revealed: Place 1 mastery counter on Paibok. Then, If Captain Paibok is in play, resolve its "Boost" ability. Otherwise, search the encounter deck and discard pile for Captain Paibok and attach it to Paibok. Shuffle the encounter deck.

name: Mastering Superpowers
text: [star] Forced Interrupt: When this scheme would be completed place 1 mastery counter on Paibok and remove all threat from here instead. Then, discard cards from the encounter deck until a [[power skrull]] card is discarded. Reveal that card. When the player phase ends, if all 4 [[power skrull]] cards are attached to Paibok, the players lose the game.

name: Captain Paibok
text: Attach to Paibok. [hazard] Hero Action: Resolve the "Boost" ability on each attachment in play that belongs to the Paibok encounter set → discard this card. [star] Boost: Heal 2 damage from Paibok. "Bow down and beg to the Skrulls!" —Paibok

name: Distracted
text: Attach to your identity. Forced Interrupt: When you thwart, reduce the amount of threat that thwart removes by 1. Hero Action: Spend [mental][mental] resources → discard this card. [star] Boost: Place 1 threat on the main scheme. "I was able to move my vital organs out of harm's way." —Paibok

name: Electricity Projection
text: Attach to Paibok. Paibok gains retaliate 1. Hero Action: Spend [mental][physical] resources → discard this card. [star] Boost: Stun a character you control. "Foolish one! You were no match for my bio-genetically engineered powers!" —Paibok

name: Hypnotized
text: Attach to your identity. As an additional cost to change form, you must spend 1 resource of any type. Hero Action: Spend [energy][energy] resources → discard this card. [star] Boost: Discard 1 card from your hand. "Bow down and beg to the Skrulls!" —Paibok

name: Ice Control
text: Attach to Paibok. [star] Forced Response: After Paibok attacks you, exhaust a character you control. Hero Action: Spend 3 resources of any type → discard this card. [star] Boost: Exhaust a character you control. "I don't know if you're incredibly brave or just plain stupid to fight me." —Paibok

name: Metallic Skin
text: Attach to Paibok and give him 1[per_hero] tough status cards. Paibok can have 1[per_hero] additional tough status card and attacks against Paibok lose piercing. Hero Action: Spend [energy][mental] resources → discard this card. [star] Boost: Give Paibok a tough status card. Interrupt: When attached ally would attack, treat Spider- Woman's printer text box as if it were blank (except for [[traits]]) until that attack resolves. "Googles that let him see and fight your kind over half a century ago!" —3-D Man

name: Shapeshifting
text: Attach to Paibok. Paibok gains stalwart and the [[aerial]] trait. Hero Action: Spend [energy][physical] resources → discard this card. [star] Boost: Confuse a character you control. "We Skrulls are shape-shifters." —Paibok "We Skrulls are shape-shifters." —Paibok

name: Trapped in Ice
text: Attach to your identity. Forced Interrupt: When you attack, reduce the amount of damage that attacks deals by 1. Hero Action: Spend [physical][physical] resources → discard this card. [star] Boost: Take 1 damage. "Welcome to your icy grave!" —Paibok

name: Devos the Devastator
text: Forced Response: After a status card is placed on a friendly character, Devos the Devastator activates against the player who controls that character. "You are apparently the least cerebrally evolved of your comrades!"

name: General Kalamari
text: When Defeated: The player who defeated General Kalamari resolves the "Boost" ability on each[[ ]]attachment in play, that belongs to the Paibok encounter set. "Our worthy goal can only be achieved if we conquer and enslave every other inhabited world!"

name: Galactic Ambassador
text: ﻿Paibok The Power Skrull was assigned to the Galactic Council as full-time diplomatic envoy. When Revealed: Place 2 additional threat here for each friendly character with a status card. [acceleration]

name: Settling Scores
text: "Now the human race will soon fear me! Hahahahaha!" —Paibok Hinder 2[per_hero]. Resolve the "Boost" ability on each boost card 1 additional time. When Revealed: Shuffle each [[power skrull]] card from the encounter discard pile into the encounter deck.

name: Council Manipulation
text: When Revealed: Paibok schemes. If you are stunned or confused, this card gains surge. "We have made a strategic alliance with the expressed purpose of obliterating our mutual enemies, the Fantastic Four." —Paibok

name: Getting Ruthless
text: When Revealed (Alter-Ego): Resolve the "Boost" ability on each attachment in play that belongs to the Paibok encounter set. When Revealed (Hero): Paibok attacks you. Give him 1 additional boost card if you are stunned or confused. "I don’t know if you’re incredibly brave or just plain stupid to fight me." —Paibok

name: Power Demonstration
text: When Revealed: Resolve the "Boost" ability on each attachment in play, that belongs to the Paibok encounter set. "You are an impetuous boy, and today I am going to teach you why I am known as the Power Skrull!" —Paibok

name: O.M.N.I.T.R.O.N.I.C.U.S.
text: Each [[revenger]] minion gains villainous. Hero Action: If there is no [[revenger]] enemy in play, spend [energy][energy] resources → discard this card. “I am O.M.N.I.T.R.O.N.I.C.U.S.! Organo-Mechanic Nexus-Iterated Techno-Radical Organizational Networked Intelligent Computer Unity System!!!”

name: Angar the Screamer
text: [star] Angar the Screamer's attacks gain ranged. Forced Interrupt: When Angar the Screamer attacks you, also resolve his attack against each other hero. "I am David Angar -- I am sane! And more -- am the Screamer-- master of the mind-storm! I am power!"

name: Asti the All-Seeing
text: Forced Interrupt: When Asti the All- Seeing takes any amount of damage, place 1 absorption counter on it. When Defeated: Assign 2 indirect damage among players for each absorption counter on Asti the All- Seeing. "We mustn't be afraid to dream a little bigger."

name: Skar
text: [star] Skar's attacks gain overkill. When Revealed: Exhaust a character you control. "I got him from an alternate universe where Mars is the dominant planet in this solar system." —The Maker

name: The Maker
text: The Maker cannot take damage while another [[revenger]] enemy is in play. When Revealed: Search the encounter deck and discard pile for The Revenge Time side scheme and reveal it. "We mustn't be afraid to dream a little bigger."

name: Vermin
text: [star] Vermin's attacks deal indirect damage. [star] Boost: If this activation is an attack, it deals indirect damage. "﻿SSSCURRY, MY FRIENDSSS! SSSCURRY AND SSSWARM! BITE AND SSSCRATCH! VICTORY CAN STILL BE OURSSS!"

name: White Tiger
text: Quickstrike. (After this minion engages your hero, it attacks you.) When Defeated: Give the villain 1 facedown boost card. "Your team is split, weakened, demoralized. Fodder for out New Revengers."

name: The Revenge Time
text: The New Revengers were a group of villains assembled by the Maker to strike directly at the New Avengers in his takeover attempt. The villain gains the [[revenger]] trait. When Revealed: Place 1 additional threat here for each [[revenger]] enemy in play. [acceleration]

name: Forming the Revengers
text: When Revealed: Discard cards from the top of the encounter deck until a card with the [[revenger]] trait is discarded. Reveal that card. "New Revengers to translocation bay. The time has come..." —The Maker

name: Kly'bn
text: When Revealed: Place 1 faith counter on Kly'bn. Forced Response: After resolving step one of the villain phase, discard the top card of the encounter deck for each faith counter on Kly'bn. Deal the players each non-treachery card discarded this way as a facedown encounter card in player order.

name: Sl'gur't
text: When Revealed: Place 1 faith counter on Sl'gur't. Forced Response: After resolving step one of the villain phase, discard the top card of the encounter deck for each faith counter on Sl'gur't. Deal the players each treachery card discarded this way as a facedown encounter card in player order.

name: Kly'bn
text: When Revealed: Place 1 faith counter on Kly'bn. Forced Response: After resolving step one of the villain phase, discard the top card of the encounter deck for each faith counter on Kly'bn. Deal the players each non-treachery card discarded this way as a facedown encounter card in player order.

name: Sl'gur't
text: When Revealed: Place 1 faith counter on Sl'gur't. Forced Response: After resolving step one of the villain phase, discard the top card of the encounter deck for each faith counter on Sl'gur't. Deal the players each treachery card discarded this way as a facedown encounter card in player order.

name: Kly'bn
text: When Revealed: Place 1 faith counter on Kly'bn and give him a tough status card. Forced Response: After resolving step one of the villain phase, discard the top card of the encounter deck for each faith counter on Kly'bn. Deal the players each non-treachery card discarded this way as a facedown encounter card in player order.

name: Sl'gur't
text: When Revealed: Place 1 faith counter on Sl'gur't and give her a tough status card. Forced Response: After resolving step one of the villain phase, discard the top card of the encounter deck for each faith counter on Sl'gur't. Deal the players each treachery card discarded this way as a facedown encounter card in player order.

name: Protect the Pantheon
text: Contents: Kly'bn I and Kly'bn II (Kly'bn II and Kly'bn III instead for expert mode). Skrull Pantheon, Dard'van Sect and Standard encounter sets. One modular encounter set (Skrull Society). Setup: Set the Skrull Pantheon environment aside, out of play.

name: Protect the Pantheon
text: Forced Interrupt: When the last threat is removed from this scheme, put the set-aside Skrull Pantheon environment into play, [[destroyed]] side faceup. Advance to stage 2B. When Completed: Put the set-aside Skrull Pantheon environment into play, [[stronghold]] side faceup. Advance to stage 2A.

name: Slaying the False Gods
text: Kly'bn, the Eternal Skrull, and Sl'gur't of the Infinite Names are presented as the emperor and the empress of the Skrull Pantheon. When Revealed: Search the encounter deck and discard pile for Strengthen the Faith side scheme, reveal it and place 2[per_hero] additional threat on it.

name: Slaying the False Gods
text: Kly'bn and Sl'gur't indirectly supported the creation and expansion of the Skrull Empire. They conquered and enslaved the pantheons of the conquered races, numbering nearly 1000 pantheons. Now the duo is after the gods of Earth. When Revealed: Flip the villain. If this stage is completed, the players lose the game.

name: Skrull Pantheon
text: Hero Action: Spend 2 resources of any type → remove 1 faith counter from the villain. Skrull Pantheon was successfully destroyed and the Skrull Diety became really angry.

name: Skrull Pantheon
text: Hero Action: Spend 2 resources of the same type → remove 1 faith counter from the villain. Kly'bn and Sl'gur't joined together and ascended to godhood becoming the leaders of the Skrull Pantheon.

name: Blessed by Kly'bn
text: Attach to the minion with the lowest SCH. If you cannot, this card gains surge. X is equal to the number of faith counters on the villain. [star] Boost: If this activation is a scheme, this card gets +2 boost icons ([boost][boost]) for this activation.

name: Blessed by Sl'gur't
text: Attach to the minion with the lowest ATK. If you cannot, this card gains surge. X is equal to the number of faith counters on the villain. [star] Boost: If this activation is an attack, this card gets +2 boost icons ([boost][boost]) for this activation.

name: Nogor
text: [star] Nogor gets +1 SCH, +1 ATK and +1 hit point for each faith counter on the villain. When Revealed: Flip the villain. [star] Boost: Flip the villain. "I am the living harness of the power of the gods."

name: Shapeless Wastes
text: The Skrullian equivalent of Hell is known as the Shapeless Wastes. Hinder 2[per_hero]. Forced Response: After an ally or a minion is defeated, if that character has the [[skrull]] trait, flip the villain. Otherwise, place 1 faith counter on the villain.

name: Strengthen the Faith
text: Most Skrulls worship Kly'bn, the Eternal Skrull, and Sl'gur't of the Infinite Names. They are the only true gods of the Skrull Empire. Forced Response: After a [[skrull]] minion enters play, place 1 faith counter on the villain. [star] Boost: Place 1 faith counter on the villain.

name: Prayer to Kly'bn
text: When Revealed: If Kly'bn is in play, he activates against you. Otherwise, flip the villain. [star] Boost: If Kly'bn is not in play, flip the villain. "For I am Kly'bn. I am the Eternal Skrull. And I love you." —Kly'bn

name: Prayer to Sl'gur't
text: When Revealed: If Sl'gur't is in play, she activates against you. Otherwise, flip the villain. [star] Boost: If Sl'gur't is not in play, flip the villain. "What do they call you? I pray you, tell us…" —Sl'gur't

name: Talisman of the Skrulls
text: When Revealed: Search the encounter deck and discard pile for Nogor and reveal him. If Nogor did not enter play this way, this card gains surge. "The Talisman is the representation of the gods, and his presence is required to ensure the gods' blessing on our endeavors" —Jazinda

name: Dard'van Fanatic
text: When Revealed: Choose to either deal 1 damage to each character you control or place 1 threat on each scheme in play. "I belong to the Dard'van sect. It's considered extreme by some." —Grrix

name: Dard'van Priest
text: When Revealed: Dard'van Priest schemes. [star] Forced Interrupt: When Dard'van Priest would attack, instead choose a card in play with a "When Revealed" ability and resolve that ability. "He loves you."

name: Dard'van Sect
text: A zealous sect of the Skrull Empire which follows prophecies foretelling that Earth will become the new home for the Skrull race. When Revealed: Give the villain 1 facedown boost card. [hazard]

name: Collective Prayers
text: When Revealed: Discard the top card of the encounter deck for each character in play. Reveal each card discarded this way that belongs to the Dard'van Sect encounter set. "…the first one loves us all alike." —Grrix

name: Sectarian Practices
text: When Revealed: Choose a card in play with a "When Revealed" ability and resolve that ability. If you cannot, this card gains surge. "Trust. What do humans know of trust? You can't even agree on one god." —Nogor

name: Spider-Woman(Veranke)
text: Spider-Woman cannot take damage. [star] Forced Response: After Spider-Woman attacks you, place 1 suspicion counter on "Who do you trust?". You are a Skrull! — Hero Action: Exhaust a hero and spend 1[per_hero] resources of any type → flip Spider-Woman. (The players can pay this ability's costs as a group.) “We now know the words as written are truth!”

name: Queen Veranke
text: Forced Response: After the villain phase ends, if any player is in alter-ego form, flip Queen Veranke. When Defeated: Remove all suspicion counters from "Who Do You Trust?". "I will be among those on Earth infiltration assignment. I will take a role in this strategy.”

name: Spider-Woman(Veranke)
text: Spider-Woman cannot take damage. [star] Forced Response: After Spider-Woman attacks you, place 1 suspicion counter on "Who do you trust?". You are a Skrull! — Hero Action: Exhaust a hero and spend 1[per_hero] resources of any type → flip Spider-Woman. (The players can pay this ability's costs as a group.) “We now know the words as written are truth!”

name: Queen Veranke
text: Forced Response: After the villain phase ends, if any player is in alter-ego form, flip Queen Veranke. When Defeated: Remove all suspicion counters from "Who Do You Trust?". "I will be among those on Earth infiltration assignment. I will take a role in this strategy.”

name: Spider-Woman(Veranke)
text: Spider-Woman cannot take damage. [star] Forced Response: After Spider-Woman attacks you, place 1 suspicion counter on "Who do you trust?". You are a Skrull! — Hero Action: Exhaust a hero and spend 1[per_hero] resources of any type → flip Spider-Woman. (The players can pay this ability's costs as a group.) “We now know the words as written are truth!”

name: Queen Veranke
text: Forced Response: After the villain phase ends, if any player is in alter-ego form, flip Queen Veranke. Otherwise, discard the top card of the encounter deck, if it is a treachery, flip Queen Veranke. "I will be among those on Earth infiltration assignment. I will take a role in this strategy.”

name: The Infiltration Has Begun
text: Contents: Spider-Woman I and Spider-Woman II (Spider-Woman II and Spider-Woman III instead for expert mode). Secret Invasion and Standard encounter sets. One modular encounter set (Army of Skrulls). Setup: Create the [[impostor]] deck and set it next to the encounter deck (see insert). Put the "Who Do You Trust?" environment into play.

name: The Infiltration Has Begun
text: [star] Place 1 additional threat here for each [[skrull]] enemy in play and each [[impostor]] ally in play. Forced Response: After your turn ends, if there are less than 2[per_hero] suspicion counters on "Who Do You Trust?", put a [[camouflaged]] ally at random from the [[impostor]] deck into play under your control.

name: The Skrull Invasion
text: The Skrulls, a ruthless group of alien shapeshifters, have secretly replaced many heroes on Earth with impostors and now they are about to strike. When Revealed: If Mistrust and Paranoia is in play, remove 2[per_hero] suspicion counters from "Who Do You Trust?". Otherwise, find Mistrust and Paranoia and reveal it.

name: The Skrull Invasion
text: X is equal to twice the number of [[skrull]] enemies in play. Forced Response: After your turn ends, if there are less than 2[per_hero] suspicion counters on "Who Do You Trust?", put a [[revealed]] minion at random from the [[impostor]] deck into play engaged with you. If this stage is completed, the players lose the game.

name: "Who Do You Trust?"
text: Forced Interrupt: When any amount of threat is placed on the main scheme, remove an equal amount of suspicion counters from here. Forced Interrupt: When any amount of threat is removed from the main scheme, place an equal amount of suspicion counters here.

name: Impostor
text: Treat attached ally as a [[skrull]] minion with a blank text box. Attached minion's SCH is equal to its printed THW and it does not take consequential damage. When Revealed: Attach to the non- [[skrull]] ally with the most remaining hit points without Impostor attached. Attached ally engages its controller. Otherwise, the villain schemes.

name: Super-Skrull Enhancement
text: Attach to the [[skrull]] minion with the most remaining hit points without another Super-Skrull Enhancement attached. If you cannot, choose a [[camouflaged]] ally, flip that ally and attach this card to it. Otherwise, this card gains surge. Attached minion gets +2 hit points. . [star] Boost: Reveal this card, after . this activation ends.

name: Super-Skrull Enhancement
text: Attach to the [[skrull]] minion with the most remaining hit points without another Super-Skrull Enhancement attached. If you cannot, choose a [[camouflaged]] ally, flip that ally and attach this card to it. Otherwise, this card gains surge. [star] Boost: Reveal this card, after this activation ends.

name: Super-Skrull Enhancement
text: Attach to the [[skrull]] minion with the most remaining hit points without another Super-Skrull Enhancement attached. If you cannot, choose a [[camouflaged]] ally, flip that ally and attach this card to it. Otherwise, this card gains surge. Attached minion gains retaliate 1. . [star] Boost: Reveal this card, after . this activation ends.

name: Chaos on the Battlefield
text: "All I know is, if there's only one way to figure out who's a Skrull… Then I'm more than happy to do it!" —Wolverine Incite 2. When Revealed: Place X additional threat here, where X is equal to the total SCH of all [[impostor]] characters in play. [acceleration]

name: Fulfill the Prophecy
text: The holy text of the Book of Worlds was the main reason the Skrulls turned the invasion of Earth into a holy war. They believed it rightfully theirs. Hinder 1[per_hero]. Each [[skrull]] minion gains guard and patrol. [hazard]

name: Mistrust and Paranoia
text: Players cannot attack minions engaged with other players or defend against them. Players cannot pay any card's or ability's costs as a group. When Revealed: Place 1 additional threat here for each friendly character in play. [acceleration]

name: Arrival of Impostors
text: When Revealed: Each player puts a [[camouflaged]] ally at random from the [[impostor]] deck into play under their control. [star] Boost: Put a [[camouflaged]] ally at random from the [[impostor]] deck into play under your control. "It's all meant to be. Fight or do not." —Queen Veranke

name: Camouflage
text: When Revealed (Queen Veranke): Flip Queen Veranke. Remove 3 suspicion counter from "Who Do You Trust?". When Revealed (Spider-Woman): Spider-Woman schemes. [star] Boost: Flip Queen Veranke, after this activation ends.

name: Glory to the Skrull Empire
text: When Revealed: Give the villain and each [[skrull]] minion engaged with you a tough status card. If the villain already has a tough status card, this card gains surge. [star] Boost: Give the villain a tough status card.

name: Infiltration Ritual
text: When Revealed: Put a [[camouflaged]] ally at random from the [[impostor]] deck into play under any player's control. If you cannot, this card gains surge. [star] Boost: Remove 3 suspicion counters from "Who Do You Trust?". "You will never shift back to this form." —Queen Veranke

name: Invasion Fleet
text: When Revealed: Each player puts a [[revealed]] minion at random from the [[impostor]] deck into play engaged with them. [star] Boost: Put a [[revealed]] minion at random from the [[impostor]] deck into play engaged with you.

name: Revelation
text: When Revealed: Flip the [[camouflaged]] ally with the most remaining hit points. If you cannot, put a [[revealed]] minion at random from the [[impostor]] deck into play engaged with you. [star] Boost: Flip 1 [[camouflaged]] ally you control, after this activation ends.

name: Captain America(Pitt'o Nili)
text: Forced Interrupt: When Captain America would leave play, flip him instead. "Your death will bring this world's heroes to their knees. Your death will bring the writings to life.” —Queen Veranke

name: Pitt'o Nili
text: Guard. (While this minion is engaged with you, you cannot attack the villain.) When Revealed: Heal all damage from Pitt'o Nili and put him into play engaged with you.

name: Captain Marvel(Khn'nr)
text: Forced Interrupt: When Captain Marvel would leave play, flip him instead. "I Speak Skrull perfectly well."

name: Khn'nr
text: When Revealed: Heal all damage from Khn'nr and put him into play engaged with you. When Defeated: Remove all suspicion counters from "Who Do You Trust?".

name: Captain Marvel(M'lanz)
text: Forced Interrupt: When Captain Marvel would leave play, flip her instead. "It was written a world of blue would be the home for all that believed." —Queen Veranke

name: M'lanz
text: When Revealed: Heal all damage from M'lanz and put her into play engaged with you. [star] Forced Interrupt: When M'lanz attacks you, also resolve her attack against each other hero.

name: Carnage(Zr'x)
text: Forced Interrupt: When Carnage would leave play, flip him instead. "It was written and it has come true." —Queen Veranke

name: Zr'x
text: Toughness. (This character enters play with a tough status card.) When Revealed: Heal all damage from Zr'x and put him into play engaged with you.

name: Daredevil(Trl'k)
text: Forced Interrupt: When Daredevil would leave play, flip him instead. "As the prophets wrote down to our ancestors." —Queen Veranke

name: Trl'k
text: While the engaged player is engaged with another [[skrull]] minion Trl'k cannot take damage. When Revealed: Heal all damage from Trl'k and put him into play engaged with you.

name: Deathlok(Fry'lu)
text: Forced Interrupt: When Deathlok would leave play, flip him instead. "This will not be easy. Most of us will die before this is over." —Queen Veranke

name: Fry'lu
text: When Revealed: Heal all damage from Fry'lu and put her into play engaged with you. When Defeated: Deal the player who defeated Fry'lu a facedown encounter card.

name: Dum Dum Dugan(Sn'Tlo)
text: Forced Interrupt: When Dum Dum Dugan would leave play, flip him instead. "You don't reveal your true self in the open."

name: Sn'Tlo
text: Reduce the amount of damage Sn'Tlo takes from each attack by 1. When Revealed: Heal all damage from Sn'Tlo and put him into play engaged with you.

name: Elektra(Siri)
text: Forced Interrupt: When Elektra would leave play, flip her instead. "My identity was not detected."

name: Siri
text: Patrol. (While this minion is engaged with you, you cannot thwart the main scheme.) When Revealed: Heal all damage from Siri and put her into play engaged with you.

name: Giant-Man(D'lutz)
text: Forced Interrupt: When Giant-Man would leave play, flip him instead. "It was written in our Book of Worlds." —Queen Veranke

name: D'lutz
text: Retaliate 1. When Revealed: Heal all damage from D'lutz and put him into play engaged with you.

name: Invisible Woman(De'Lila)
text: Forced Interrupt: When Invisible Woman would leave play, flip her instead. "It's true! I'm not Susan Richards; I am a Skrull!"

name: De'Lila
text: As an additional cost to attack De'Lila, you must spend 1 resource of any type. When Revealed: Heal all damage from De'Lila and put her into play engaged with you.

name: Iron Fist(Grrix)
text: Forced Interrupt: When Iron Fist would leave play, flip him instead. "He loves me… He loves me… He loves me…" —Queen Veranke

name: Grrix
text: When Revealed: Heal all damage from Grrix and put him into play engaged with you. When Defeated: The villain attacks the player who defeated Grrix (even if that player is in alter-ego form).

name: Iron Man(Ssrov)
text: Forced Interrupt: When Iron Man would leave play, flip him instead. "In spite of all that you've done to our empire, he loves you." —Queen Veranke

name: Ssrov
text: [star] While the villain has the [[revealed]] trait, Ssrov gets +1 SCH and +1 ATK. When Revealed: Heal all damage from Ssrov and put him into play engaged with you.

name: Moon Knight(Hs'fld)
text: Forced Interrupt: When Moon Knight would leave play, flip him instead. "A billion Skrulls died to prove the words true." —Queen Veranke

name: Hs'fld
text: When Revealed: Heal all damage from Hs'fld and put him into play engaged with you. When Defeated: The player who defeated Hs'fld puts a [[camouflaged]] ally at random from the [[impostor]] deck into play under their control.

name: Nick Fury(H'kurrek)
text: Forced Interrupt: When Nick Fury would leave play, flip him instead. "It was written a wave would come." —Queen Veranke

name: H'kurrek
text: [star] H'kurrek's attacks gain overkill, piercing, and ranged. When Revealed: Heal all damage from H'kurrek and put him into play engaged with you.

name: Phoenix(Korya)
text: Forced Interrupt: When Phoenix would leave play, flip her instead. "You will kill her. After we'll switch you out." —Queen Veranke

name: Korya
text: When Revealed: Heal all damage from Korya and put her into play engaged with you. [star] Forced Response: After Korya attacks you, discard the top card of each player's deck.

name: Spider-Man(Ch'Gra)
text: Forced Interrupt: When Spider-Man would leave play, flip him instead. "Well, I do hate myself, but I don't know if I feel like smacking myself around."

name: Ch'Gra
text: When Revealed: Heal all damage from Hagar and put him into play engaged with you. When Defeated: Flip Queen Veranke.

name: Thor(Hagar)
text: Forced Interrupt: When Thor would leave play, flip him instead. "He even loves you." —Criti Noll

name: Hagar
text: [star] Hagar's attacks deal indirect damage. When Revealed: Heal all damage from Hagar and put him into play engaged with you.

name: Venom(Dharr)
text: Forced Interrupt: When Venom would leave play, flip him instead. "We now know the words as written are truth!" —Queen Veranke

name: Dharr
text: Villainous. (When this minion activates, give it a boost card.) When Revealed: Heal all damage from Dharr and put him into play engaged with you.

name: Wolverine(V'lrym)
text: Forced Interrupt: When Wolverine would leave play, flip him instead. "This is as it is written. And no Skrull or man can change that." —Commander Chrell

name: V'lrym
text: Quickstrike. When Revealed: Heal all damage from V'lrym and put him into play engaged with you.

name: Yellowjacket(Criti Noll)
text: Forced Interrupt: When Yellowjacket would leave play, flip him instead. "It won't be long until we have a Skrull in every state!"

name: Criti Noll
text: Incite 3. (When this card is revealed, place 3 threat on the main scheme.) When Revealed: Heal all damage from Criti Noll and put her into play engaged with you.

name: Crusader
text: Victory 1. When Revealed: Deal 1 damage to each character you control. Give the villain 1 facedown boost card for each character defeated this way. [star] Boost: Put Crusader into play engaged with you. "I've been entrusted with the most important duty in the Skrull Empire."

name: Enemy Adaptation
text: Attach to a [[skrull]] minion. If you cannot, attach to the villain. You cannot defend against attached enemy's attacks. Hero Action: Give the villain 1 facedown boost card → discard Enemy Adaptation.

name: Freedom Ring
text:
Attach to Crusader. If Crusader is not in play, discard cards from the top of the encounter deck until a minion is discarded. Put that minion into play engaged with you and attach this card to it. If you cannot, give the villain 1 facedown boost card.
Attached minion gains villainous.

name: Spy Training
text: Z'Reg, a Skrull operative who had been scarred by fellow trainee K'rtem, was sent to spy on the Avengers after his training was complete. When Revealed: Defeat an ally you control and give the villain 1 facedown boost card. [hazard]

name: Rivals to the End
text: When Revealed: Choose a minion. That minion attacks your hero twice in a row. If no attack was made this way, give the villain 1 facedown boost card for each character you control. "Your strategy is pathetic, human! You rush into battle and then you cradle your weak! Ha! Let me show you how Skrulls heed the call!" —K'rtem

name: Jazinda
text: Victory 1. The villain gets +1 SCH. [star] Boost: Put Jazinda into play engaged with you. "Pretending to be human is amusing. Especially when I do it so much better than you."

name: Skrull Energy Gun
text: Attach to a [[skrull]] minion. If you cannot, attach to the villain. While attached to a [[skrull]] enemy, attached enemy's attacks gain overkill, piercing, and ranged. Hero Action: Spend a [physical] resource → attach this card to another enemy.

name: Sy-Torak Gem
text: Attach to Jazinda. If you cannot, attach to the villain. Attached character gets +3 hit points. Hero Action: Give the villain 1 facedown boost card and spend a [energy] resource → discard Sy-Torak Gem.

name: Stealing for the Empire
text: A former agent of the Skrull Empire was sent to recover a sacred artifact of the Skrull stolen by the Kree. When Revealed: Discard cards from the encounter deck until you discard an attachment. Reveal that attachment. Then, place threat on the main scheme equal to the number of boost icons ([boost]) on that attachment. [acceleration]

name: Skrull of Royal Blood
text: Surge. When Revealed: Shuffle all cards with the highest number of boost icons ([boost]) in the encounter discard pile into the encounter deck.

name: Skymax
text: Victory 1. When Revealed: Shuffle all minions from the encounter discard pile into the encounter deck. [star] Boost: Put Skymax into play engaged with you. "Oh, he fought bravely, but never really stood a chance… against the Skrullian Skymaster."

name: Changing Appearance
text: Attach to a [[skrull]] minion. If you cannot, attach to the villain. Attached enemy cannot be attacked. Forced Interrupt: When attached enemy would attack, it schemes instead. Then, discard this card. Hero Action: Spend 2 resources . of a diferent type → discard . Skrull Adaptation.

name: Surprising Alliance
text: "I am my world's last survivor." —Skymax Forced Response: When a player discards an ally from their hand, they put that ally into play engaged with them instead. Treat that ally as a minion with a blank text box. Its SCH is equal to its printed THW and it does not take consequential damage. [crisis]

name: Shape Alteration
text: When Revealed: Remove each stunned and confused status card from each [[skrull]] enemy and give each [[skrull]] enemy a tough status card. If there are no [[skrull]] enemies in play, this card gains surge. [star] Boost: Give 1 [[skrull]] enemy a tough status card.

name: War Skrull
text: Victory 1. [star] Forced Response: After War Skrull attacks you, discard the top 2 cards of your deck. [star] Boost: Put War Skrull into play engaged with you. "Did you really think, in that puny little head of yours, that you could go toe-to-toe with the might of the Skrull Empire?"

name: Impostor
text: Treat attached ally as a [[skrull]] minion with a blank text box. Attached minion's SCH is equal to its printed THW and it does not take consequential damage. When Revealed: Attach to the non- [[skrull]] ally with the most remaining hit points without Impostor attached. Attached ally engages its controller. Otherwise, the villain schemes.

name: Skrull Commander
text: Each other [[skrull]] minion gets +1 ATK. [star] Boost: If this activation is an attack, this card gets +2 boost icons ([boost][boost]) for this attack. "If he was a significant threat, we would know who he is" —Commander Ak'strk

name: Skrull Geneticist
text: [hazard] [star] Boost: Deal yourself a facedown encounter card. "These results are fascinating"

name: Cloning Program
text: The Skrull scientists had cloned samples of Deadpool's blood and use it to upgrade a squadron of Super-Skrulls. They also place Deadpool in charge of training these new Super-Skrulls. Each [[skrull]] minion activates 1 additional time during the step two of the villain phase. Threat cannot be removed from this scheme while there is no . [[skrull]] minion in play. [crisis]

name: Xavin
text: Victory 1. When Revealed: Discard cards from the encounter deck until a treachery is discarded. Reveal that treachery. [star] Boost: Put Xavin into play engaged with you. "My name is Xavin, Super-Skrull-in-training. I was forced to abandon my outpost world to protect my mate from murderous thugs like you."

name: Invisible Forcefield
text: Attach to the enemy with the highest printed hit points and without another Invisible Forcefield attached. If you cannot, this card gains surge. Forced Interrupt: When any amount of damage would be dealt to attached character, place it here instead. Then, if there is at least 5 damage here, discard this card.

name: Super-Skrull Training Program
text: "Always remember, when you face a superior opponent, learn their weaknesses. Exploit them. That is the Skrull way." —Commander Chrell When Revealed: Give each [[skrull]] enemy a tough status card. [amplify]

name: Going Nova
text: When Revealed: Assign 2[per_hero] indirect damage among players. "Damnation. I keep forgetting how fragile you people are." —Xavin
